required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy Study of Botulinum Toxin Type A for the Treatment of Forehead and Frown Lines
clinical_study.official_title: A Multi-Centre, Double-Blind, Randomized, Placebo-Controlled, Parallel-Group, Single Treatment Cycle Study of BOTOX® Cosmetic (Botulinum Toxin Type A) Purified Neurotoxin Complex in Subjects With Forehead and Glabellar Rhytides

brief_summary.textblock: This study evaluated the safety and efficacy of botulinum toxin Type A compared to placebo for the treatment of forehead lines (facial rhytides) when also administered to frown lines (glabellar rhytides).

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Achieving a Score of None or Mild by Investigator-Assessed Facial Wrinkle Scale With Photonumeric Guide (FWS) in Forehead Lines at Maximum Eyebrow Elevation
primary_outcome.description: The Investigator assessed the severity of the patient's forehead lines at maximum eyebrow elevation using the 4-point FWS: 0=none, 1=mild, 2=moderate or 3=severe. The percentage of participants with a score of none or mild at Day 30.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Achieving a Score of None or Mild by Subject-Assessed Facial Wrinkle Scale With Photonumeric Guide (FWS) in Forehead Lines at Maximum Eyebrow Elevation
primary_outcome.description: The patient assessed the severity of their forehead lines at maximum eyebrow elevation using the 4-point FWS: 0=none, 1=mild, 2=moderate or 3=severe. The percentage of participants with a score of none or mild at Day 30.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Achieving Satisfied or Very Satisfied by Subject Assessment of Satisfaction of Appearance of Forehead Lines
secondary_outcome.description: Participants rated their overall satisfaction with the appearance of the forehead line area using a 5-point scale: 1=very unsatisfied, 2=unsatisfied, 3=neutral, 4=satisfied or 5=very satisfied. The percentage of participants with a rating of satisfied or very satisfied at Day 30.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With a ≥1 Grade Improvement From Baseline by Investigator-Assessed FWS in Forehead Lines at Rest
secondary_outcome.description: The Investigator assessed the severity of the patient's forehead lines at rest using the 4-point FWS: 0=none, 1=mild, 2=moderate or 3=severe. The percentage of participants with a ≥1 grade improvement from baseline.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With a ≥1 Grade Improvement From Baseline by Subject-Assessed FWS in Forehead Lines at Rest
secondary_outcome.description: Participants assessed the severity of their forehead lines at rest using the 4-point FWS: 0=none, 1=mild, 2=moderate or 3=severe. The percentage of participants with a ≥1 grade improvement from baseline.

arm_group.description: Botulinum toxin Type A 40 Units (total dose) injected into bilateral forehead and frown line areas on Day 1.
Botulinum toxin Type A 30 Units (total dose) injected into bilateral forehead and frown line areas on Day 1.
Placebo (Normal saline) injected into bilateral forehead and frown line areas on Day 1.

intervention.description: Botulinum toxin Type A (total dose 30 Units or 40 Units) injected into bilateral forehead and frown line areas on Day 1.
Normal Saline (placebo) injected into bilateral forehead and frown line areas on Day 1.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Moderate to severe forehead lines
Exclusion Criteria:
- Current or previous botulinum toxin treatment of any serotype within one year
- Diagnosis of myasthenia gravis, Eaton-Lambert syndrome, amyotrophic lateral sclerosis
- Prior facial cosmetic surgery (e.g. prior periorbital surgery, facial lift, brow lift, eyelid lift or eyebrow surgery)
- Facial laser or light treatment, microdermabrasion, or superficial peels within 3 months
- Oral retinoid therapy within one year

outcome.population: Intent-to-treat population included all randomized participants.

measure.title: Percentage of Participants Achieving a Score of None or Mild by Subject-Assessed Facial Wrinkle Scale With Photonumeric Guide (FWS) in Forehead Lines at Maximum Eyebrow Elevation
measure.description: The patient assessed the severity of their forehead lines at maximum eyebrow elevation using the 4-point FWS: 0=none, 1=mild, 2=moderate or 3=severe. The percentage of participants with a score of none or mild at Day 30.
measure.population: Intent-to-treat population included all randomized participants.

outcome.title: Percentage of Participants Achieving Satisfied or Very Satisfied by Subject Assessment of Satisfaction of Appearance of Forehead Lines
outcome.description: Participants rated their overall satisfaction with the appearance of the forehead line area using a 5-point scale: 1=very unsatisfied, 2=unsatisfied, 3=neutral, 4=satisfied or 5=very satisfied. The percentage of participants with a rating of satisfied or very satisfied at Day 30.
outcome.population: Includes participants from the Intent-to-treat Population (all randomized participants) with a rating of very unsatisfied, unsatisfied or neutral in the Subject's Assessment of Satisfaction of Appearance at baseline.

measure.title: Percentage of Participants Achieving Satisfied or Very Satisfied by Subject Assessment of Satisfaction of Appearance of Forehead Lines
measure.description: Participants rated their overall satisfaction with the appearance of the forehead line area using a 5-point scale: 1=very unsatisfied, 2=unsatisfied, 3=neutral, 4=satisfied or 5=very satisfied. The percentage of participants with a rating of satisfied or very satisfied at Day 30.
measure.population: Includes participants from the Intent-to-treat Population (all randomized participants) with a rating of very unsatisfied, unsatisfied or neutral in the Subject's Assessment of Satisfaction of Appearance at baseline.

outcome.title: Percentage of Participants With a ≥1 Grade Improvement From Baseline by Investigator-Assessed FWS in Forehead Lines at Rest
outcome.description: The Investigator assessed the severity of the patient's forehead lines at rest using the 4-point FWS: 0=none, 1=mild, 2=moderate or 3=severe. The percentage of participants with a ≥1 grade improvement from baseline.
outcome.population: Participants from the intent-to-treat population (all randomized participants) with a Facial Wrinkle Score of at least mild at baseline.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: A disclosure restriction on the PI is that the sponsor can review results communications prior to public release and can embargo communications regarding trial results for a period that is less than or equal to 90 days from the time submitted to the sponsor for review. The sponsor cannot require changes to the communication and cannot extend the embargo.
